page.title: 03RECREATION 1
page.content: Rotherwick has a fishing lake called "Patches." You pay Â£2 to the farmer and you may fish in either of the two lakes. The small lake has{Trout}under 3lbs. and it has{Tench, Roach, Rud, Perch, } and{Crucian Carp.}The big lake is stocked with{Mirror Carp, Rainbow {Trout, Brown Trout, Trench}and{Crucian {Carp.} One rod is Â£2, two are Â£4 and so on. The pond contains a lot of weed and there are lots of water voles. The fish are put in the big lake at 5lbs. and taken out at 12lbs..Sunday is the busiest day for fishing. The lake is owned by Mrs. Mitchell but it is rented to Mr. Patch.
